name: CON LA SOL
description:
Hi! This is the result of staying up for 24 hours and forgetting to work on your game.

Originally, this game was to be a typing western experience™ but instead it became a sort of screensaver that i rushed in so that i could have gotten something into the jam on time.

basically, controlls are enter, f5 and the mouse.

i will definitely accept the fate this game has in this jam, and i will understand if it doesn't be a part of the exhibition which is named the "Marfa Film Festival," or something else.

i will absolutely add on to this and make it an actual game, but in the meantime here's a screensaver for your western petscii self.
